statement: No proposal under consideration to provide free electricity to all farmers nationwide.
Government announces increased subsidies on electricity for small and marginal farmers under existing schemes.
Government launches new initiative to support solar irrigation pumps for farmers.
Ministry of Power clarifies that electricity subsidies are implemented at the state level.
Central Government denies reports about nationwide free electricity for all households.
Government introduces scheme to provide financial assistance for installing solar panels on agricultural lands.
No nationwide scheme for completely free electricity to all categories of farmers has been notified.
Government announces interest subvention scheme for farmers availing crop loans.
Government states that decisions on free electricity to farmers are under the purview of state governments.
Clarification issued that news reports claiming universal free power supply are factually incorrect.
